nodes.text: The Starros clan, also known as the Starros family was a clan that was active during the High Republic Era. Among its members were Avon Starros and her mother, Ghirra Starros. Centuries after the High Republic Era, the clan's descendant, Sana Starros, operated as a smuggler.

The Starros clan was first mentioned in the announcement of the postponement of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. Sana Starros, an Imperial Era character first featured in Marvel Comics' 2015 Star Wars series, is a descendant of the family, but it is unknown if she is a member of the clan. Justina Ireland, author of The High Republic: A Test of Courage, confirmed that there is a story arc planned to show how the Starros family went from wealthy politicians and scientists to "scum and villainy."
